name: part_011
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】『Connect Addict』✨3rd Anniversary Live【#獅白ぼたん3周年】 [dsH4DXtSpqk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental introduction with dramatic lighting and visual effects. The performers Botan, Nene, Polka, and Lamy dance as the stage transforms.
Live performance of the song 'RADIANT FORCE' by NePoLaBo (Botan, Nene, Polka, Lamy).

subtitles.original: 始まる歌 始まる鼓動
subtitles.english: The song begins, the heartbeat begins

subtitles.original: 響き鳴り渡れ 希望の音
subtitles.english: Resonate and ring out, the sound of hope

subtitles.original: 生きることを諦めないと
subtitles.english: That I won't give up on living

subtitles.original: 示せ 熱き夢の 幕開けを
subtitles.english: Show the opening of a passionate dream

subtitles.original: 放て この奇跡に 嘘はない
subtitles.english: Let it loose, there's no lie in this miracle

subtitles.original:
RADIANT FORCE
作詞/作曲：上松範康(Elements Garden) 編曲：藤間 仁(Elements Garden)
subtitles.english:
RADIANT FORCE
Lyrics/Composition: Noriyasu Agematsu (Elements Garden) Arrangement: Hitoshi Fujima (Elements Garden)

subtitles.original: その手は何を掴むためにある？
subtitles.english: What are those hands for?

subtitles.original: たぶん待つだけじゃ叶わない
subtitles.english: Probably just waiting won't make it come true

subtitles.original: その手は何を守るためにある？
subtitles.english: What are those hands for protecting?

subtitles.original: 伝う熱は明日を
subtitles.english: The heat that is transmitted will...

subtitles.original: 輝かす種火に
subtitles.english: ...become the spark that illuminates tomorrow

subtitles.original: さあ新時代へ 引き金を引こう
subtitles.english: Now, to a new era, let's pull the trigger

subtitles.original: 伝説の未来へとカウントダウン
subtitles.english: Countdown to the legendary future

subtitles.original: 羽撃きは一人じゃない
subtitles.english: The flapping of wings is not alone

subtitles.original: 過去を越えた先に
subtitles.english: Beyond the past

subtitles.original: 創るべき歴史が
subtitles.english: The history that should be created

subtitles.original: 咲き燃えてる
subtitles.english: Is blooming and burning

subtitles.original: 絆 心 一つに束ね
subtitles.english: Bonds, hearts, bundled into one

subtitles.original: 響き鳴り渡れ 希望の音
subtitles.english: Resonate and ring out, the sound of hope

subtitles.original: 信ずることを諦めないと
subtitles.english: That I won't give up on believing

subtitles.original: 唄え 可能性に ゼロはない
subtitles.english: Sing, there is no zero in possibility

subtitles.original: 翔べよ この奇跡に 光あれ
subtitles.english: Fly! Let there be light in this miracle

subtitles.original: 切り裂け まだ見ぬ日に行くために
subtitles.english: Tear it open, to go to a day not yet seen

subtitles.original: 不可能なんて何一つない
subtitles.english: There is nothing impossible

subtitles.original: こんなに心強いことはない
subtitles.english: There is nothing more encouraging than this

subtitles.original: 絶対 絶対 絶対 信じ合いぶっちぎる
subtitles.english: Definitely, definitely, definitely, believing in each other and tearing through

subtitles.original: たとえ闇に吸い込まれそうになって
subtitles.english: Even if I'm about to be sucked into the darkness

subtitles.original: 涙さえも血に濡れて苦しくっても
subtitles.english: Even if even my tears are soaked in blood and painful

subtitles.original: 帰る場所が待っている
subtitles.english: A place to return to is waiting

subtitles.original: 集え 護れ 契れ
subtitles.english: Gather, protect, pledge

subtitles.original: 勇気の結晶が
subtitles.english: The crystal of courage

subtitles.original: 奇跡なんだ
subtitles.english: Is a miracle

subtitles.original: 願い 祈り すべてを背負い
subtitles.english: Wishes, prayers, carrying it all

subtitles.original: 本気を超えた本気の唄
subtitles.english: A serious song that exceeds seriousness

subtitles.original: 痛みなんて何も怖くない
subtitles.english: Pain is not scary at all

subtitles.original: 曝け出せ 震わせろ この身体
subtitles.english: Expose it, make it tremble, this body

subtitles.original: さあ 闇より 稲妻を
subtitles.english: Now, lightning from the darkness

subtitles.original: 出会い 笑い合い そして 泣きじゃくり
subtitles.english: Meeting, laughing together, and then sobbing

subtitles.original: 命の炎も 一緒に燃やして
subtitles.english: Burning the flame of life together

subtitles.original: 五感の全部が叫ぶ
subtitles.english: All five senses scream

subtitles.original: 愛と呼べるほどの
subtitles.english: Enough to be called love

subtitles.original: 眩しく煌めいた
subtitles.english: Dazzlingly sparkling

subtitles.original: 友の証
subtitles.english: Proof of friends

subtitles.original: 絆 心 一つに束ね
subtitles.english: Bonds, hearts, bundled into one

subtitles.original: 響き鳴り渡れ 希望の音
subtitles.english: Resonate and ring out, the sound of hope

subtitles.original: 信ずることを諦めないと
subtitles.english: That I won't give up on believing

subtitles.original: 唄え 可能性に ゼロはない
subtitles.english: Sing, there is no zero in possibility

subtitles.original: 翔べよ この奇跡に
subtitles.english: Fly! To this miracle...
